Posts.Content: SuzyQ2012 wrote: This has been the best resource since my scare started just about a month ago. Thanks to everyone that responded to my posts and gave me opinions, comfort and prayers. This has been a very stressful time, and I truly feel that this forum was a tremendous help. I hope God blesses each and everyone of you on this site. I am so happy to report that my biopsy came back negative. I go back in 6 months, and I am going to enjoy life for a while. I'll be thinking of all those I connected with here. I hope you all get the results that I did. Hugs! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Thanks for all your support! SuzyQ2012 Beesie

Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2012 10:56AM SuzyQ2012 wrote: Glad you don't have to wait too long! I am waiting for a consult with a breast surgeon. Radiologist recommends a stereo- biopsy. My GP said that the BS will probably recommend the biopsy as well. The waiting is so hard.
Posts.Title: New Here, with questions !!! Melissa_P sewingnut

Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2012 10:01PM SuzyQ2012 wrote: I, too am in the waiting stages. From everything I've read, you won't be told if its cancer until the pathology report comes back. I pick up my films tomorrow. I was thinking of looking at them also to do some comparisons, although, I really have no idea what to look for. Good luck to you.
